examples.title: Layout Examples
examples.subtitle: Explore our collection of layout templates and design patterns with live examples showcasing different page structures and components.

homepageVideo.title: Homepage with Video Background
homepageVideo.description: Full-screen video background with hero content overlay. Perfect for creating engaging landing experiences with autoplay video and accessible controls.

subpageSidebar.title: Subpage with Sidebar
subpageSidebar.description: Traditional layout with main content area and sidebar for resources and related information.

bentoboxGrid.title: Bentobox Grid Layout
bentoboxGrid.description: Masonry-style grid with variable card sizes for dynamic, magazine-like displays.

blogGallery.title: Blog Gallery
blogGallery.description: Blog listing page with search, category filters, tag cloud, and sortable post grid. Ideal for content-heavy sites.

blogPost.title: Blog Post
blogPost.description: Individual article template with table of contents, author bio, and related posts.

contactForm.title: Contact Form
contactForm.description: Comprehensive contact page with form validation, business information, hours, emergency support details, and map integration placeholder.

splashLanding.title: Splash/Landing Page
splashLanding.description: Conversion-focused page with minimal navigation for campaigns and promotions.
